source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a nighttime, high-angle shot of a futuristic, stylized cityscape. The central focus is a tall, sleek skyscraper with a curved design, illuminated by bright blue lights along its edges and a pattern of glowing white triangles on its facade. The surrounding city is dark, with glowing white lines tracing paths like roads or a digital network around other silhouetted buildings.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a nighttime, high-angle shot of a futuristic, stylized cityscape. The central focus is a tall, sleek skyscraper with a curved design, illuminated by bright blue lights along its edges and a pattern of glowing white triangles on its facade. The surrounding city is dark, with glowing white lines tracing paths like roads or a digital network around other silhouetted buildings.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides along a winding mountain trail during the day. The lead cyclist accelerates around a sharp bend, followed by the others who maintain a steady pace. In the background, a river flows parallel to the path as the cyclists continue their ascent up the hillside.
